definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate

sentences.english: Jane made up stories to amuse her little brother .
sentences.chinese: 簡編故事逗她的小弟弟。

sentences.english: The compendium represents an indispensable review of key work in the area.
sentences.chinese: 簡編代表着該地區的重點工作不可缺少的審查。
